com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl

Class UserServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl.DataServiceImpl<User,java.lang.Long>
      • com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl.UserServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataService<User,java.lang.Long>, UserService, org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService

    @Service
 @ComponentScan(basePackages={"com.salimov.yurii.dao","com.salimov.yurii.service.data"})
public final class UserServiceImpl
extends DataServiceImpl<User,java.lang.Long>
implements UserService, org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
    The class of the service layer, implements a set of methods for working with objects of the User class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    User, UserService, DataServiceImpl, UserDao

        Parameters:
        name - a name of the new user.
        login - a login of the new user.
        password - a password of the new user.
        description - a description of the new user.

        twitter - a twitter url of the new user.
        skype - a skype username of the new user.
        photoUrl - a photo Url to the new user.
        isValid - a validated of the new user.
        isMailing - a permit to send a letters on the user email.
        isLocked - locked the user or not.
        Returns:
        The new saving user.
